text: Mbali ding'onyo dikali ijo digwiligwa hamwe na mulotezi wa uvwizi yakalile kotenda mauzauza hanhu hake. Kwa mauzauza yayo kakala kawagiza waja wowakalile na chilaguso cha ding'onyo dikali ijo, waja wakalile woitumbalila mavindi nyang'hiti yake. Ding'onyo dikali hamwe na mulotezi ija wa uvwizi wang'hali wagima wasigwa muna dilamba dodimemile mabwe ya baluti yoyokwaka moto.
